feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 12:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.5°C
Wind: WSW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow in the evening. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
